title: Stuck Updating
body: My little brother is trying to update to patch 6.14 but it wont go past 33%. I don't kniw what to do to fix it on his PC besides running admin and that didn't work.  Any help?

replies.body: At this point in the patcher, files are trying to be downloaded from our patcher servers but being prevented due to a connection issue.  Have your brother (or yourself) go over the troubleshooting steps in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to get tihs fixed up.  Hit me up if you encounter any error messages or issues, or have any questions!

Ok well I did most of what it said but It wasn't working, so I downloaded the Hextech Repair Tool to uninstall the patch and reinstall it. It removed it but again when the patch got to 33% it stopped going up. Now the files  scanned is still increasing to a highly unreasonable number. What should I do?

Let it do its thing.  It needs to scan files and repair any corrupt files.  Depending on your computer, this may take some time.  Unless you receive any errors, it will keep scanning until it's done.  If you stop the process it will have to start all over again.  Since the connection guide didn't resolve this, please reach out to our tech team to help out by [submitting a ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).

Ok i'll give it an hour. Then if It doesn't improve ill submit a ticket. His computer is fairly old too, it's an HP Pavilion that we got maybe 5 years ago? It doesn't run things very well but we have never had a problem with updating LOL on it before. Thanks for the advice though
